content.value: I caught up on #StarTrekDiscovery S3 in the last week and I just adore how they've turned Engineering into a big queer family with the two gay dads proud of their non-binary genius child, and the lesbian aunt who keeps popping round to give one-liners.
content.html: I caught up on #StarTrekDiscovery S3 in the last week and I just adore how they've turned Engineering into a big queer family with the two gay dads proud of their non-binary genius child, and the lesbian aunt who keeps popping round to give one-liners.
